entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
